about_the_game:
Game Description

You are a scientist from an ordinary city. When you get comfortable in front of the TV, you will learn about the nuclear war. You pack your bags and escape to your basement. Your task is to find a way to leave the crash site in 90 days. Communicate with the military, search for surviving objects in buildings, uncover secrets, upgrade skills and discover the truth about yourself.

Collect and Explore

Explore the devastated city, abandoned houses and other places full of dangers and secrets. Each place hides surviving items: food, medicine, tools and other items for survival. But be careful - every move you make can attract the attention of enemies ready to profit from your property.

Fear the Dark

As darkness falls, the world becomes even more dangerous. Some of those you consider allies may give you away. And nocturnal creatures, bred by radiation, roam the wasteland. Every moment spent outside can be your last. Don't stay out late at night to avoid unusual and deadly encounters.

Upgrade Skills

Develop your survival skills: find new tactics, learn to work with weapons and improve your abilities to better defend yourself from threats. Uncover secrets of your past that will help you understand what really happened and how it affected your existence. But hurry - nuclear winter is approaching and you need to be prepared!

Are you ready to face the dangers of the wasteland and save your life?
